柔: (juu/nyū/yawa) - tender , soft, fragile, weak, poorly built, insubstantial
柔い: (やっこい) - soft; (やわい only) weak
柔よく剛を制す: (じゅうよくごうをせいす) - soft and fair goes far; willows are weak, yet they bind other wood
柔らか: (yawaraka) - macio, terno, mole, apagado (cor ou luz), gentil, manso
柔らかい: (yawarakai) - soft, tender, pliant, supple, limber, limp; gentle, mild, mellow , soft, tender, pliant, supple, limber, limp; gentle, mild, mellow; informal, light, flexible (por exemplo, pensando)
柔らかい文章: (やわらかいぶんしょう) - informal style
柔らかい毛布: (やわらかいもうふ) - soft blanket
柔らかな光: (やわらかなひかり) - soft light

柔んわり: (やんわり) - (irreg. use of 柔) softly; mildly; gently

柔婉: (じゅうえん) - simple; plain; honest; unaffected; frank; unpretentious
柔弱: (にゅうじゃく) - weakness; effeminacy; enervation

柔術: (じゅうじゅつ) - jujitsu (classical Japanese martial art, usually referring to fighting without a weapon); jiujitsu; jujutsu
